abstract: Four founding partners of Old Lane, the hedge fund shut down by Citigroup in 2008, are getting back into the game with a new shingle, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Four founding partners of Old Lane, the hedge fund shut down by Citigroup in 2008, are getting back into the game with a new shingle, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Four founding partners of Old Lane, the hedge fund shut down by Citigroup in 2008, are getting back into the game, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Old Lane Founders Said to Launch New Fund
